ack.p: Authors would like to express their gratitude to the authorities of Iran meteorological organization (IRIMO). The authors also wish to thank of Department of Communicable Disease, Deputy of Health, Qom University of Medical Sciences, Qom, Iran for providing their daily records. This article has been extracted from the Ph.D. thesis written by Zahra Asadgol in the Department of Environmental Health Engineering, School of Public health at Iran University of Medical Sciences.
